title: Project-Based Education Grounded in the EPIC Approach for Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic organizational management and leadership knowledge, with project execution experience
context.additional_context: Customized training for science sector managers/leaders to enhance organizational learning capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can complete a project designing an organizational learning culture by applying the EPIC framework (Education, Patience, Innovation, Collaboration)
Learners can analyze organizational learning barriers in digital and AI environments and propose solutions
Learners can develop and implement three or more innovative ideas with team members using collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
